DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety effectiveness HEALOS compare autograft use transforaminal lumbar interbody fusion ( TLIF ) method .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Healos Bone Replacement Treat Degenerative Disc Disease
DOC.criteria: Persistent back and/or leg pain refractory 6 month nonsurgical therapy Male female 18 70 year age ( inclusive ) Objective evidence significant disc degeneration one two adjacent lumbar level ( ) L2/L3 L5/S1 Significant disc degeneration two adjacent level Greater Grade II spondylolisthesis Prior fusion surgery lumbar spine ( prior discectomies intradiscal electrothermal therapy [ IDET ] allow ) Insulindependent diabetes mellitus Pregnant lactating , wish become pregnant within 24 month duration study
DOC.keyword: One Two Level Degenerative Disc Disease
